entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 29.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 15 February 2023
